Certificate in Business And Administration

I has been four years CBA at Paris Descartes train and gather together talented students from different disciplines. Network build during this two-week workshop remains a strong point of all the participants.

If you want to find out about my experience at CBA please check out my post.

Here are some facts and figures we prepared with some CBA representatives and Pierre Girard, the organiser of the Part I.
